channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: rothgar /awesome-tuis | N/A | 11,464
item.description: List of projects that provide terminal user interfaces

item.title: GitHubDaily /GitHubDaily | N/A | 40,846
item.description: 坚持分享 GitHub 上高质量、有趣实用的开源技术教程、开发者工具、编程网站、技术资讯。A list cool, interesting projects of GitHub.

item.title: microsoft /generative-ai-for-beginners | Jupyter Notebook | 95,954
item.description: 21 Lessons, Get Started Building with Generative AI

item.title: asgeirtj /system_prompts_leaks | JavaScript | 9,631
item.description: Collection of extracted System Prompts from popular chatbots like ChatGPT, Claude & Gemini

item.title: anuraghazra /github-readme-stats | JavaScript | 75,425
item.description: ⚡ Dynamically generated stats for your github readmes

item.title: spotDL /spotify-downloader | Python | 21,499
item.description: Download your Spotify playlists and songs along with album art and metadata (from YouTube if a match is found).

item.title: HunxByts /GhostTrack | Python | 4,679
item.description: Useful tool to track location or mobile number

item.title: moeru-ai /airi | Vue | 10,362
item.description: 💖🧸 Self hosted, you owned Grok Companion, a container of souls of waifu, cyber livings to bring them into our worlds, wishing to achieve Neuro-sama's altitude. Capable of realtime voice chat, Minecraft, Factorio playing. Web / macOS / Windows supported.

item.title: winapps-org /winapps | Shell | 7,277
item.description: Run Windows apps such as Microsoft Office/Adobe in Linux (Ubuntu/Fedora) and GNOME/KDE as if they were a part of the native OS, including Nautilus integration. Hard fork ofhttps://github.com/Fmstrat/winapps/

item.title: plait-board /drawnix | TypeScript | 7,645
item.description: 开源白板工具（SaaS），一体化白板，包含思维导图、流程图、自由画等。All in one open-source whiteboard tool with mind, flowchart, freehand and etc.
